text: João Belchior Marques Goulart (March 1, 1918 – December 6, 1976) was the 24th President of Brazil. He was deposed by a coup d'état in April 1, 1964. f Category:Presidents of Brazil Category:1918 births Category:1976 deaths Category:Politicians from Rio Grande do Sul Category:Presidents of the Federal Senate
title: João Goulart
